Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.errorMessaging.impl

Class SpecificationErrorMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.errorMessaging.impl.SpecificationErrorMsg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorMessagable
    public class SpecificationErrorMsg
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorMessagable

    A class to store error messages from archetype checks.

    Author:
    designed by Jacques Gignoux - 6 mai 2019, made useful by Ian Davies - 30 Nov 2019

      • errorName

        public java.lang.String errorName()
        Description copied from interface: ErrorMessagable
        Largely for debugging. Some string that indicates exactly the type of message. For example implementations may use enums and so the type could be the enum.name(). Additional prefix to verbose2 strings.
        Specified by:
        errorName in interface ErrorMessagable

      • category

        public java.lang.String category()
        Description copied from interface: ErrorMessagable
        Allows some way of organizing messages in some category order. Best used as a prefix to all verbose1/2 strings.

        category in interface ErrorMessagable
